system.description: You are able to dampen your Aura, making it difficult to read your moods and intentions. You may spend the 2 PP cost as an [Interrupt 3] Free Action when someone attempts to probe your Aura using Aura Empathy to inflict a -20 penalty to any triggering Aura Sense check.
